6a092173-4564-4ff8-a21e-7d38bb4d2bea.plaintext: Sponsoring the annual conference is the best way to help Plone and its community to keep growing and evolving.

6b9d8457-8654-44df-9a04-51f3b274c138.plaintext: Sponsoring the event means associating your brand with open and collaborative free software initiatives. It is also a unique opportunity to establish strategic partnerships, conduct recruitments, and make connections.
